h1.a: New Mexico Schools Closed Remainder of Year - Online learning continues!

article.div:
As of Friday, March 27, all New Mexico schools will be closed for the rest of the school year in response to the ongoing international coronavirus pandemic. Tierra Encantada will continue with Online Learning/Learn from Home model.
El viernes 27 de marzo, todas las escuelas de Nuevo MÃ©xico permanecerÃ¡n cerradas por el resto del aÃ±o escolar en respuesta a la actual pandemia internacional de coronavirus. Tierra Encantada continuarÃ¡ con el modelo de Aprendizaje en lÃ­nea / Aprender desde el hogar. MÃ¡s informaciÃ³n por venir!

h1.a: COMPUTER DISTRIBUTION THIS EVENING (MARCH 23rd)/DISTRIBUCIÃN DE COMPUTADORAS ESTA TARDE! (23 de marzo)

article.div:
COMPUTER DISTRIBUTION THIS EVENING (March 23rd)! Good evening, due to the recent order by Governor Lujan-Grisham that goes into effect tomorrow, we will distribute computers this evening for those who have requested a computer. This includes all 9th-12th grade students and students who did not collect theirs today. We will begin at 5:30pm â 7:00pm at school. This distribution is only for students who have requested computers. Please come by this evening to collect your computers for online instruction.

h1.a: UPDATE FROM TIERRA ENCANTADA ON CORONAVIRUS

article.div: Tierra Encantada Lottery is complete! We are in the process of notifying parents that have been accepted for 7th grade! All grades 8th, 9th, 10th, and 11th please check your email and/or a text message from âREMINDâ â our message service for notifications. If you have any questions please contact the school!

Tierra Encantada Charter School Lottery is open! La Loteria esta abierta!
We are currently accepting lottery applications for new students for the 2020-2021 School Year Lottery. The last day to submit applications will be Friday, February 21st, 2020. Lottery will be drawn on Wednesday, February 26th 5:00pm in the school lobby.

Due to icy road conditions Tierra Encantada will be on a two hour delay Wednesday, February 5th. School will start two hours later. Stay Safe!
